name: Crystar (beta)
description:
Made for the Retrograde Jam (design an 8-bit era game circa 1991)  Crystar is designed to look like a lost gem from Sega's Game Gear. The game gear was a powerful piece of hardware for its day. 

The game itself is an an action adventure platformer, that upon completion will have a huge map to explore,  100+ different powers to use, and plenty of items and treasure to find and loot. An amalgam of of all of my favorite games I hope you like it :)
